result.execSummary:
The defendant Allan Michael Zanow was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Carrying A Concealed Weapon, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 941.23(2).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Provide DNA Sample by 12/30/2022.
All mandatory court costs, fees, and assessments to be paid by 12/30/2022. Failure to pay will result in a civil judgment.
Any cash bail on deposit to apply if applicable.
Court waives all non-mandatory costs due to inability to pay.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Allan Michael Zanow

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Allan Michael Zanow in court with attorney Russell J. A. Jones.  Tristan J. Bednarek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Case in court for Plea/Sentencing hearing.

Parties have reached an agreement. State places offer on the record. Defense and defendant are in agreement.

Pursuant to negotiations and on the Motion of the State, Court Ordered Count 2 DISMISSED BUT READ IN for the purpose of sentencing.

As to Count 1: Defendant changes plea to GUILTY. Defendant examined as to plea, advised of Constitutional Rights and the maximum penalties. Defendant further advised that if not a US citizen, deportation is possible. Court found that the defendant knowingly, voluntarily and intelligently waived rights.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights form, Addendum, and Elements/Jury Instructions received and filed. Parties stipulate to the Criminal Complaint as a factual basis to sustain defendant's plea. Court found defendant GUILTY and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered on the record.  

Sentencing proceeded. State has complied with victim notification. Statements by parties and defendant. 

As to Count 1: Court sentenced the defendant to serve 5 days in the House of Correction, with credit for 5 days served. TIME SERVED DISPOSITION.

CONDITIONS :
- All mandatory court costs, fees, and assessments to be paid by 12/30/2022. Failure to pay will result in a civil judgment.
- Provide DNA Sample by 12/30/2022.
- Any cash bail on deposit to apply if applicable.
- Court waives all non-mandatory costs due to inability to pay.

*Court advised defendant of right to seek post conviction relief.

Defendant Allan Michael Zanow in court with attorney Russell J. A. Jones.  Tristan J. Bednarek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Scheduling conference held. Defense counsel is prepared to proceed with a plea and sentencing hearing. State does not have victim notification. Case is adjourned for a plea and sentencing hearing in branch 29.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 22, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Addendum to Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights, filed.
Plea Questionnaire Waiver of Rights, flied

Defendant Allan Michael Zanow in court with attorney Russell J. A. Jones.  Lisa M Valenti-Jordan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Scheduling conference held. Defense counsel has discovery and requests an additional scheduling conference.  Case is adjourned to Br. 29.  Scheduling conference scheduled for July 12, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Allan Michael Zanow in court.  Lisa M Valenti-Jordan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Pre-trial conference held.  Matter held via Zoom video conference and streamed through DAcast.  Court conducted Indigency Hearing. Court held colloquy with defendant. Court found defendant is eligible for appointment of counsel by court. Defendant requested court appointed counsel and agreed to reimburse Milwaukee County for the expense. The court appointed Atty. Russ Jones, present in court, to represent defendant in this matter at County expense and at the rate of $100.00 per hour. The court ordered the defendant repay the County at a rate of $50.00 per month beginning at the completion of the case, and then the 1st of each month there after. Court advised defendant failure to pay will result in a civil judgment. Signed, Distributed & Filed, Order Appointing Attorney at County Expense. Case is adjourned to Br. 29.  This hearing will be streamed live via https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/c105c3fe-89b8-5d05-5f8c-b6cf0d4921da  Scheduling conference scheduled for June 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services LEVEL 2 SUPERVISION.  Court reminders.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.  Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.

Defendant Allan Michael Zanow in court with attorney Colleen A Taylor.  Defendant Allan Michael Zanow in custody.  Alexander C. Dyer appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Allan Michael Zanow appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Kiefer, Branch 29. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  This hearing will be streamed live via https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/c105c3fe-89b8-5d05-5f8c-b6cf0d4921da  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 12, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered no contact with Kayla M.R.
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

ADDRESS INFO for Allan Michael Zanow
Current: 5813 N 40th St, Milwaukee, WI 53209   (Effective: 04-19-2022)
Prior: 752 South 26th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53204
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
